events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all, and I want to return it for a refund. Please advise on the process.
The customer request has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to mention of a return and refund.
Assigning the refund case to the Returns Specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your return and refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is new, tags are still on, and itâ€™s in the original box.
Thank you for the info. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid return label attached to your order confirmation email. Once received, we'll process your refund within 5 business days.
Great, thanks for the clear instructions! I will send it back today and look forward to the refund.
Glad I could assist! Your refund case is now considered resolved pending the return shipment.
Just checking in to confirm that you have sent back the jacket and that your refund has been processed successfully.
Yes, I sent the jacket last week and received the refund today. Thank you for your help!
Thank you for confirming. We are closing the case now. Have a great day!
We have sent you a short survey to rate your support experience. Your feedback is appreciated.
